Package io.frictionlessdata.tableschema.tabledatasource

Class CsvTableDataSource

java.lang.Object
io.frictionlessdata.tableschema.tabledatasource.AbstractTableDataSource<String>
io.frictionlessdata.tableschema.tabledatasource.CsvTableDataSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
TableDataSource
public class CsvTableDataSource extends AbstractTableDataSource<String>
Implements a TableDataSource based on CSV-Data in:
  • An InputStream
  • An remote URL
  • A local File
  • A String
To define CSV properties like record delimiters or whether the data has a header row, the class uses the Apache Commons CSV CSVFormat class. Actual parsing is done via the CSVParser from the same project. The default CSV format for this class is based on RFC4180 (https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc4180) with a header row, ignoring whitespace around column values and "\n" as a record separator.
